Name: Mind Trap
About the game: This little experimental game invites you to get new game experience. The aim of the game is to understand its aim. To achieve it you must explore the game world, and every part of it reflects metaphysical conscience and asks player – “Why do people lie” Features Technogenic design Open little world Player searches the aim himself No saving Controls WASD - movement Space - jump LMB - drag/drop tables and chairs Esc - lose focus in Web version (permanent quit in standalone version)
Meta Title: Mind Trap: Jun 18, 2018, SaintHeiser and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Mind Trap? Check out the release date (Jun 18, 2018), developer insights from SaintHeiser, and a complete game summary.
